name: Google Ad Banners Template by MK-Way
description:
Google ad Banners


These are all the banner sizes Google uses for ads.


What you need to do:


1.Duplicate the file

2.Replace the elements with your own

3.Export PNG files


*If you found this from our website follow the instructions on the video tutorial you have received!


And you're done!


Sizes:

  • 970x250;
  • 970x90;
  • 728x90;
  • 468x60;
  • 320x100;
  • 120x600;
  • 160x600;
  • 300x600;
  • 240x400
  • 250x250;
  • 200x200;
  • 300x250;
  • 336x280;


Enjoy!
